description:
updates for your Polar device.

Polar FlowSync 3 Polar FlowSync application iconis compatible with:

- A300
- A360
- A370
- Grit X
- Ignite
- Loop
- Loop 2
- Loop Crystal
- M200
- M400
- M430
- M450
- M460
- OH1
- Unite
- Vantage M
- Vantage V
- V650
- V800

![screenshot](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ITS-Unibas/chocolatey-community-packages@master/automatic/polar-flowsync/screenshot.png)
summary:
Download FlowSync to sync all your training sessions and activity
    data with the Polar Flow web service for more in-depth analysis. With it you
    can also get updates for your Polar device.
author: Polar Electro
